Motivational.title: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

Motivational.title: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

Motivational.title: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

Motivational.title: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

Motivational.title: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
Motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Motivational.title: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Motivational.author: Walt Disney

Motivational.title: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.

Motivational.title: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
Motivational.author: Anonymous

Motivational.title: Dream big and dare to fail.
Motivational.author: Norman Vaughan

Motivational.title: Your talent determines what you can do. Your motivation determines how much you're willing to do. Your attitude determines how well you do it.

Motivational.title: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Motivational.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Motivational.title: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Motivational.author: John D. Rockefeller

Motivational.title: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.

Motivational.title: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

Motivational.title: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.

Motivational.title: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.

Motivational.title: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

Motivational.title: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Motivational.author: Mark Twain

Motivational.title: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

Motivational.title: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
Motivational.author: Will Rogers

Motivational.title: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

Motivational.title: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

Motivational.title: Nothing will work unless you do.

Motivational.title: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

Motivational.title: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.

Motivational.title: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

Motivational.title: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
Motivational.author: Booker T. Washington

Motivational.title: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Motivational.author: Peter Drucker

Motivational.title: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Motivational.author: Winston Churchill

Motivational.title: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Motivational.author: Lao Tzu

Motivational.title: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
Motivational.author: Carol Burnett

Motivational.title: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.

Motivational.title: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
Motivational.author: Ayn Rand

Motivational.title: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Motivational.author: George Addair

Motivational.title: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle and giving 110% all the time.

Motivational.title: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Motivational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Motivational.title: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
Motivational.author: Vince Lombardi

Motivational.title: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Motivational.author: John Lennon

Motivational.title: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.

Motivational.title: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Motivational.author: Zig Ziglar

Motivational.title: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
Motivational.author: Amelia Earhart

Motivational.title: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
Motivational.author: Wayne Gretzky

Motivational.title: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.

Motivational.title: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.

Motivational.title: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.

Motivational.title: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Motivational.author: Jim Ryun

Motivational.title: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Motivational.author: Charles Kingsleigh

Motivational.title: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
Motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

Motivational.title: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
Motivational.author: Thomas A. Edison

Motivational.title: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
Motivational.author: Sheryl Sandberg

Motivational.title: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
Motivational.author: Tony Robbins

Motivational.title: It always seems impossible until it's done.
Motivational.author: Nelson Mandela

Motivational.title: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.

Motivational.title: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.

Motivational.title: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
Motivational.author: Chinese Proverb

Motivational.title: Only the paranoid survive.

Motivational.title: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.

Motivational.title: I wake up every morning and think to myself, 'How far can I push this company in the next 24 hours?'

Motivational.title: We need to accept that we won't always make the right decisions, that we'll screw up royally sometimes – understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success.

Motivational.title: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Motivational.author: Christopher Columbus

Motivational.title: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.

Motivational.title: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can't hear them anymore.

Motivational.title: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.

Motivational.title: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.

Motivational.title: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.

Motivational.title: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.

Motivational.title: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.

Motivational.title: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.

Motivational.title: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.

Motivational.title: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.

Motivational.title: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

Motivational.title: If you want to make a permanent change, stop focusing on the size of your problems and start focusing on the size of you!

Motivational.title: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

Motivational.title: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

Motivational.title: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.

Motivational.title: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

Inspirational.author: C.S. Lewis

Inspirational.title: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears.
Inspirational.author: Chantal Sutherland

Inspirational.title: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
Inspirational.author: Dolly Parton

Inspirational.title: You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
Inspirational.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Inspirational.title: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.
Inspirational.author: Audrey Hepburn

Inspirational.title: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
Inspirational.author: William Shakespeare

Inspirational.title: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
Inspirational.author: Albert Einstein

Inspirational.title: You are the master of your destiny. You can influence, direct and control your own environment.
Inspirational.author: Napoleon Hill

Inspirational.title: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
Inspirational.author: Norman Vincent Peale

Inspirational.title: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
Inspirational.author: Aesop

Inspirational.title: Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them.
Inspirational.author: William Shakespeare

Inspirational.title: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Inspirational.author: Zig Ziglar

Inspirational.title: If you're going through hell, keep going.
Inspirational.author: Winston Churchill

Inspirational.title: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
Inspirational.author: Jimmy Johnson

Inspirational.title: Courage is grace under pressure.
Inspirational.author: Ernest Hemingway

Inspirational.title: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
Inspirational.author: Oscar Wilde

Inspirational.title: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
Inspirational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Inspirational.title: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
Inspirational.author: William Morris

Inspirational.title: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
Inspirational.author: Napoleon Hill

Inspirational.title: The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will.
Inspirational.author: Chuck Palahniuk

Inspirational.title: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
Inspirational.author: Socrates

Inspirational.title: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.
Inspirational.author: Oprah Winfrey

Inspirational.title: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
Inspirational.author: J.K. Rowling

Inspirational.title: Comfort and prosperity have never enriched the world as much as adversity has.
Inspirational.author: Billy Graham

Inspirational.title: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
Inspirational.author: Joseph Campbell

Inspirational.title: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more.
Inspirational.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

Inspirational.title: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
Inspirational.author: Colin R. Davis

Inspirational.title: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
Inspirational.author: John Wooden

Inspirational.title: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Inspirational.author: George Bernard Shaw

Inspirational.title: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
Inspirational.author: Margaret Mead

Inspirational.title: Do not let making a living prevent you from making a life.
Inspirational.author: John Wooden

Inspirational.title: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
Inspirational.author: Plutarch

Inspirational.title: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Inspirational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Inspirational.title: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
Inspirational.author: Benjamin Franklin

Inspirational.title: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
Inspirational.author: Robert Frost

Inspirational.title: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
Inspirational.author: Napoleon Hill

Inspirational.title: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Inspirational.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

Inspirational.title: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
Inspirational.author: Colin Powell

Inspirational.title: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
Inspirational.author: Confucius

Inspirational.title: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
Inspirational.author: Socrates

Inspirational.title: The purpose of our lives is to add value to the people of this generation and those that follow.
Inspirational.author: T. Harv Eker

Inspirational.title: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
Inspirational.author: Jim Rohn

Inspirational.title: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Inspirational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Inspirational.title: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
Inspirational.author: Mark Twain

Inspirational.title: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Inspirational.author: Vidal Sassoon

Inspirational.title: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
Inspirational.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

Inspirational.title: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
Inspirational.author: Nelson Mandela

Inspirational.title: The greatest wealth is health.
Inspirational.author: Virgil

Inspirational.title: What we think, we become.
Inspirational.author: Buddha

Inspirational.title: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
Inspirational.author: Marcus Aurelius

Inspirational.title: Destiny is not a matter of chance, it is a matter of choice.
Inspirational.author: William Jennings Bryan

Inspirational.title: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
Inspirational.author: Beverly Sills

Inspirational.title: Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
Inspirational.author: Alice Morse Earle

Inspirational.title: The mountains are calling and I must go.
Inspirational.author: John Muir

Inspirational.title: Persistence guarantees that results are inevitable.
Inspirational.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

Inspirational.title: First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win.
Inspirational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Inspirational.title: Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent.
Inspirational.author: Anonymous

Inspirational.title: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
Inspirational.author: Mark Twain

Inspirational.title: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
Inspirational.author: Neale Donald Walsch

Inspirational.title: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
Inspirational.author: George Washington

Inspirational.title: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
Inspirational.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Inspirational.title: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
Inspirational.author: Lao Tzu

Inspirational.title: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
Inspirational.author: Ayn Rand

Inspirational.title: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
Inspirational.author: John F. Kennedy

Inspirational.title: Do what you love, love what you do.
Inspirational.author: Wayne Dyer

Success.title: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Success.author: Henry David Thoreau

Success.title: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
Success.author: Colin R. Davis

Success.title: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Success.author: Albert Schweitzer

Success.title: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
Success.author: W.P. Kinsella

Success.title: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
Success.author: John D. Rockefeller

Success.title: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency.
Success.author: Dwayne Johnson

Success.title: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
Success.author: Maya Angelou

Success.title: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.title: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Success.author: Robert Collier

Success.title: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
Success.author: Conrad Hilton

Success.title: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
Success.author: Roy T. Bennett

Success.title: Success is focusing the full power of all you are on what you have a burning desire to achieve.
Success.author: Wilfred Peterson

Success.title: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Success.author: Vidal Sassoon

Success.title: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
Success.author: George S. Patton

Success.title: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
Success.author: Booker T. Washington

Success.title: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Success.author: Bruce Lee

Success.title: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
Success.author: Aisha Tyler

Success.title: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
Success.author: Bill Gates

Success.title: The key to success is to start before you are ready.
Success.author: Marie Forleo

Success.title: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
Success.author: Bobby Unser

Success.title: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
Success.author: Colin Powell

Success.title: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
Success.author: Tony Robbins

Success.title: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
Success.author: Orison Swett Marden

Success.title: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire, the size of your dream, and how you handle disappointment along the way.
Success.author: Robert Kiyosaki

Success.title: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.
Success.author: Arnold H. Glasow

Success.title: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
Success.author: Henry Ford

Success.title: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph.
Success.author: Zig Ziglar

Success.title: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
Success.author: Molière

Success.title: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Success.author: Bo Bennett

Success.title: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
Success.author: Jim Rohn

Success.title: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
Success.author: John Wooden

Success.title: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
Success.author: John Wooden

Success.title: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.
Success.author: Napoleon Hill

Success.title: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
Success.author: Benjamin Disraeli

Success.title: Success is the child of audacity.
Success.author: Benjamin Disraeli

Success.title: There is no success without hardship.
Success.author: Sophocles

Success.title: Success is dependent on effort.
Success.author: Sophocles

Success.title: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
Success.author: Oscar Wilde

Success.title: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
Success.author: David Frost

Success.title: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
Success.author: Albert Einstein

Success.title: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
Success.author: Mark Caine

Success.title: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it.
Success.author: Dalai Lama

Success.title: Success is falling nine times and getting up ten.
Success.author: Jon Bon Jovi

Success.title: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again.
Success.author: William Edward Hickson

Success.title: Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: I can't give you a sure-fire formula for success, but I can give you a formula for failure: try to please everybody all the time.
Success.author: Herbert Bayard Swope

Success.title: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Success.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Success.title: Success is achieved by those who try and keep trying with a positive mental attitude.
Success.author: W. Clement Stone

Success.title: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
Success.author: Michael Jordan

Success.title: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
Success.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Success.title: Success is not about being the best. It's about always getting better.
Success.author: Behance

Success.title: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
Success.author: Dale Carnegie

Success.title: Failure is success in progress.
Success.author: Albert Einstein

Success.title: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Success.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Success.title: Success is not a destination, but the road that you're on.
Success.author: Marlon Wayans

Success.title: The key to success is to keep growing in all areas of life - mental, emotional, spiritual, as well as physical.
Success.author: Julius Erving

Success.title: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Success.author: Thomas Jefferson

Success.title: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Success.author: John D. Rockefeller

Success.title: Success is a journey, not a destination.
Success.author: Ben Sweetland

Success.title: The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda.
Success.author: John C. Maxwell

Success.title: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
Success.author: Albert Einstein

Success.title: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Success.author: Walt Disney

Success.title: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
Success.author: Thomas J. Watson

Success.title: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.
Success.author: Colin Powell

Success.title: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
Success.author: Bill Gates

Success.title: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
Success.author: Chris Grosser

Success.title: The successful man is the one who finds out what is the matter with his business before his competitors do.
Success.author: Roy L. Smith

Success.title: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
Success.author: Henry Ford

Success.title: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
Success.author: Chinese Proverb

Success.title: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
Success.author: Orison Swett Marden

Success.title: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Success.author: Robert Collier

Success.title: Success isn't just about what you accomplish in your life; it's about what you inspire others to do.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.title: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
Success.author: Albert Schweitzer

Success.title: Success comes to those who dare to act, and seldom to those who claim they are ready.
Success.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Success.title: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.
Success.author: Dale Carnegie

Success.title: If you don't value your time, neither will others. Stop giving away your time and talents. Value what you know and start charging for it.
Success.author: Kim Garst

Success.title: Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result.
Success.author: Oscar Wilde

Success.title: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
Success.author: Dale Carnegie

Success.title: Success isn't overnight. It's when every day you get a little better than the day before. It all adds up.
Success.author: Dwayne Johnson

Success.title: Action is the foundational key to all success.
Success.author: Pablo Picasso

Success.title: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.
Success.author: Earl Nightingale

Success.title: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.
Success.author: Barack Obama

Success.title: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
Success.author: Thomas A. Edison

Success.title: Success occurs when opportunity meets preparation.
Success.author: Zig Ziglar

Success.title: The dictionary is the only place where success comes before work.
Success.author: Vince Lombardi

Success.title: Success is loving life and daring to live it.
Success.author: Maya Angelou

Success.title: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
Success.author: Jim Rohn

Success.title: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Success.author: Bruce Lee

Success.title: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
Success.author: Tony Robbins

Success.title: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
Success.author: Zig Ziglar

Success.title: Success requires first expending ten units of effort to produce one unit of results. Your momentum will then produce ten units of results with each unit of effort.
Success.author: Charles J. Givens

Success.title: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
Success.author: Abraham Lincoln

Success.title: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
Success.author: Vince Lombardi

Success.title: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
Success.author: Coco Chanel

Success.title: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
Success.author: William Feather

Success.title: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
Success.author: Jim Rohn

Success.title: People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed, and the more they find a way to succeed.
Success.author: Tony Robbins

Success.title: Success is never owned; it is only rented—and the rent is due every day.
Success.author: Rory Vaden

Success.title: Success is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: Success is often the result of taking a misstep in the right direction.
Success.author: Al Bernstein

Success.title: The greatest success we'll know is helping others succeed and grow.
Success.author: Gregory Scott Reid

Success.title: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
Success.author: Napoleon Hill

Success.title: Success is what comes after you stop making excuses.
Success.author: Luis Galarza

Success.title: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
Success.author: Robert Kiyosaki

Success.title: Success is blocked by concentrating on it and planning for it... Success is shy - it won't come out while you're watching.
Success.author: Tennessee Williams

Success.title: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
Success.author: Herman Cain

Success.title: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
Success.author: Booker T. Washington

Success.title: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Success.author: Vidal Sassoon

Success.title: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
Success.author: Pelé

Success.title: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
Success.author: Benjamin Franklin

Success.title: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
Success.author: Napoleon Hill

Success.title: Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work hard at it.
Success.author: Mark Zuckerberg

Success.title: Success is the sum of details.
Success.author: Harvey S. Firestone

Success.title: Some people dream of success while others wake up and work.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.title: Try not to become a man of success, but rather become a man of value.
Success.author: Albert Einstein

Success.title: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
Success.author: Florence Nightingale

Success.title: Success is not what you have, but who you are.
Success.author: Bo Bennett

Success.title: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.
Success.author: Brian Tracy

Success.title: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
Success.author: Helen Keller

Success.title: Success is nothing more than moving from failure to failure with undiminished enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
Success.author: Bruce Feirstein

Success.title: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.
Success.author: Arnold H. Glasow

Success.title: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
Success.author: Woody Allen

Success.title: Success is about creating benefit for all and enjoying the process.
Success.author: Arianna Huffington

Success.title: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
Success.author: Joyce Brothers

Success.title: Success is the ability to see potential in everything.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.title: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
Success.author: Virat Kohli

Success.title: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
Success.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Success.title: Success is a journey not a destination.
Success.author: Ben Sweetland

Success.title: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
Success.author: Steve Jobs

Success.title: What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
Success.author: Stephen King

Success.title: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
Success.author: Bill Cosby

Success.title: The number one reason people fail in life is because they listen to their friends, family, and neighbors.
Success.author: Napoleon Hill

Success.title: Success is staying true to who you are. Period.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.title: Success is a journey not a destination.
Success.author: Arthur Ashe

Success.title: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
Success.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

Success.title: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
Success.author: Lance Armstrong

Success.title: Success is as dangerous as failure.
Success.author: Lao Tzu

Success.title: Behind every successful man is a surprised woman.
Success.author: Maryon Pearson

Success.title: Success often comes to those who dare to act. It seldom goes to the timid who are ever afraid of the consequences.
Success.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

Success.title: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
Success.author: Chinese Proverb

Success.title: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
Success.author: Bill Bradley

Success.title: Nothing succeeds like success.
Success.author: Alexandre Dumas

Success.title: If you wish to succeed in life, make perseverance your bosom friend, experience your wise counselor, caution your elder brother, and hope your guardian genius.
Success.author: Joseph Addison

Success.title: The successful always has a number of projects planned, to which he looks forward. Anyone of them could change the course of his life overnight.
Success.author: Mark Caine

Success.title: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
Success.author: Tom Stoppard

Success.title: All human wisdom is summed up in two words; wait and hope.
Success.author: Alexandre Dumas

Success.title: Success is achieved by developing our strengths, not by eliminating our weaknesses.
Success.author: Marilyn vos Savant

Success.title: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
Success.author: Milton Berle

Success.title: Formula for success: rise early, work hard, strike oil.
Success.author: J. Paul Getty

Success.title: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Success.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Success.title: The measure of success is not whether you have a tough problem to deal with, but whether it is the same problem you had last year.
Success.author: John Foster Dulles

Success.title: Behind every successful man there's a lot of unsuccessful years.
Success.author: Bob Brown

Success.title: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
Success.author: Tim Ferriss

Success.title: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Success.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Success.title: Success is the ability to go from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: Success is measured by happiness, not money or power.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.title: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.
Success.author: Confucius

Success.title: Success is like a mountain that keeps growing ahead of you as you hike it... and there's the very top, which is getting farther and farther away as you climb it.
Success.author: Jack White

Success.title: Success doesn't necessarily come from breakthrough innovation but from flawless execution.
Success.author: Naveen Jain

Success.title: Success is not in never failing, but rising every time you fall!
Success.author: Jonathan Taylor

Success.title: Success is finding satisfaction in giving a little more than you take.
Success.author: Christopher Reeve

Success.title: To be successful, you must act big, think big and talk big.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.title: Success is not forever and failure isn't fatal.
Success.author: Don Shula

Success.title: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off the goal.
Success.author: Henry Ford

Success.title: The person who gets the farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.
Success.author: Dale Carnegie

Success.title: Success is never achieved by the size of our brain but it is always achieved by the quality of our thoughts.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.title: Small daily improvements are the key to staggering long-term results.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.title: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Success.author: Mark Twain

Success.title: Success is a process, a quality of mind and way of being, an outgoing affirmation of life.
Success.author: Alex Noble

Success.title: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
Success.author: Truman Capote

Success.title: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.title: Success is not how far you got, but the distance you traveled from where you started.
Success.author: Steve Prefontaine

Success.title: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
Success.author: Shiv Khera

Success.title: Success is a collection of problems solved.
Success.author: I.M. Pei

Success.title: Progress equals happiness.
Success.author: Tony Robbins

Success.title: The elevator to success is out of order. You'll have to use the stairs, one step at a time.
Success.author: Joe Girard

Success.title: Success is the child of drudgery and perseverance. It cannot be coaxed or bribed; pay the price and it is yours.
Success.author: Orison Swett Marden

Success.title: The best way to succeed in this world is to act on the advice you give to others.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.title: Success is more permanent when you achieve it without destroying your principles.
Success.author: Walter H. Cottingham

Success.title: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
Success.author: Paul J. Meyer

Success.title: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
Success.author: Henry Ford
